bibl.title: Two Royal Ordinances of the First Century and the Alexandrians.
bibl.note: Version originale: Les ordonnances royales C.Ord.Ptol. 75-76 (Héracléopolis, 41 avant J.-C.), ChrEg 70 (1995) Nos 139-140, pp. 206-222.
